item.title: 通用汽车批准新的 60 亿美元股票回购计划
item.description: 通用汽车公司周二表示，作为新股票回购计划的一部分，公司将回购价值 60 亿美元的流通股。【原文：General Motors said on Tuesday it will buy back outstanding shares worth $6 billion as part of a new stock repurchase plan.】

item.title: 亚历山大-汉密尔顿的银行有了新名字：纽约银行
item.description: 美国历史最悠久的银行正在更名。【原文：The oldest U.S. bank is getting a new name.】

item.title: 行业组织称，尽管电动汽车关税调查，中国汽车制造商仍致力于欧洲市场
item.description: 中国一家主要汽车行业协会周二表示，中国汽车制造商在欧洲的投资计划不会因欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车进行反补贴调查而受到影响。【原文：Chinese automakers' plans to invest in Europe won't be deflected by the EU's anti-subsidy probe into Chinese-made electric vehicles, a leading Chinese auto industry association said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 市场等待美联储决议和 CPI 数据，期货下跌
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走低，盘中表现平淡，因为投资者期待着重要的通胀数据和美联储周三宣布的政策。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Tuesday, set for a muted session as investors looked ahead to crucial inflation data and a policy announcement from the Federal Reserve on Wednesday.】

item.title: 解说员：美国业界希望看到 "行政法中的伏地魔 "消亡
item.description: 美国商业利益集团希望最高法院在未来几周内推翻四十年前确立的一项法律原则，该原则在数以千计的有关监管行动的法律诉讼中支持了联邦政府的立场。【原文：U.S. business interests are hoping the Supreme Court in the coming weeks will overturn a legal doctrine established four decades ago that has bolstered the federal government's position in thousands of legal battles concerning regulatory actions.】

item.title: 泰国三起法庭案件加剧不确定性，令市场惶惶不安
item.description: 泰国的三起法庭案件，包括一起牵连总理的案件，加剧了东南亚第二大经济体的政治不确定性，并导致投资者逃离股市。【原文：Three court cases in Thailand, including one that has ensnared the prime minister, have heightened political uncertainty in Southeast Asia's second largest economy and sent investors fleeing its stock market.】

item.title: GameStop 业绩下滑，到期日临近，"咆哮的凯蒂猫 "期权头寸承压
item.description: 随着 GameStop 股价的波动和合约到期日的临近，YouTube 上被称为 "咆哮的小猫 "的股票影响者基思-吉尔（Keith Gill）锁定其 GameStop 期权头寸收益的时间正在流逝。【原文：The clock is ticking for Keith Gill, the stock influencer known on YouTube as "Roaring Kitty," to lock in gains on his options position in GameStop as the company’s share price wobbles and the expiration date for the contracts draws closer.】

item.title: 解说员：特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬福利会发生什么变化？
item.description: 特斯拉股东周四将投票决定是否恢复首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）被特拉华州法官否决的 560 亿美元薪酬方案，无论投票结果如何，都不会迅速解决问题。【原文：A Tesla shareholder vote on Thursday on whether to reinstate CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package that was shot down by a Delaware judge will not provide a quick resolution, irrespective of the tally's results.】

item.title: 美国 5 月小型企业景气度上升，但迫在眉睫的大选为前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，5月份美国小型企业的信心和招聘计划均增至今年最高水平，但迫在眉睫的美国总统大选也使不确定性达到近四年来的最高点。【原文：U.S. small-business confidence and hiring plans increased in May to their highest levels of the year, but the looming U.S. presidential election also drove uncertainty to nearly a four-year high, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞购苹果推进人工智能与欧洲的麻烦
item.description: 阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: 中国的折扣战有可能巩固消费者的节俭观念
item.description: 中国低成本零售商积极抢占市场，为一些企业带来了丰厚的收益，但同时也加剧了一场伤痕累累的价格战，加剧了世界第二大经济体对通货紧缩的担忧。【原文：An aggressive market grab by low-cost Chinese retailers has delivered bumper earnings for some firms but has also intensified a bruising price war, exacerbating deflationary fears in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 高管称瑞银和瑞士信贷的瑞士部门可能在 7 月 1 日前合并
item.description: 本周二援引瑞银集团一位高级管理人员的话说，瑞银集团和瑞士信贷集团瑞士分部的合并最早可能于 7 月 1 日完成。【原文：The merger of the Swiss units of UBS and Credit Suisse could be completed as early as July 1, a senior executive at UBS was quoted as saying on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加密世界足球代币在体育之夏到来之前大放异彩
item.description: 随着欧洲和美洲重大赛事足球热的升温，加密世界中一个小而热闹的部分正在占据中心舞台：球迷代币。【原文：As football fever builds for major tournaments in Europe and the Americas, a small yet buzzy part of the cryptoverse is stealing centre stage: fan tokens.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，日本定点工作初创公司 Timee 目标于 7 月上市
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士透露，日本初创企业Timee将于7月在东京上市。【原文：Japan startup Timee, which operates a platform connecting workers seeking side gigs with labour-strapped businesses, is targeting a listing in July in Tokyo, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场期待从政治震荡中企稳
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 欧盟政治增加新风险，亚洲股市区间震荡
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市窄幅震荡，投资者对欧洲市场新的政治不确定性进行了思考，此前右翼势力在法国大选中获胜，而法国的快速民意调查又重新引发了人们对欧洲集团凝聚力的担忧。【原文：Asian stocks traded in a narrow range on Tuesday, as investors pondered fresh political uncertainty in European markets after right-wing gains in elections and a snap poll in France revived concerns about the cohesion of the bloc.】

item.title: 随着用户寻求升级，苹果推动人工智能可能会重振 iPhone 的销量
item.description: 苹果公司在周一举行的开发者大会上，不仅为其软件注入了最新的人工智能技术，还包括来自 ChatGPT 的技术。【原文：Apple's developer conference on Monday was about more than infusing its software with the latest artificial intelligence technology, including from ChatGPT.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 5 月商业形势走软，成本压力上升
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于销售和利润增长放缓，澳大利亚5月份的商业状况进一步放缓，低于长期平均水平，同时成本压力有重新加快的迹象。【原文：Australian business conditions eased further in May to below their long-run average as growth in sales and profits slowed, a survey showed on Tuesday, while cost pressures showed signs of re-accelerating.】

item.title: 美元在关键通胀测试和美联储最新预测前保持坚挺
item.description: 周二，美元兑欧元徘徊在一个月高点附近，美元兑日元升至一周高点，因为交易员们在为第二天至关重要的美国通胀数据和美联储新的利率预测做准备。【原文：The dollar hovered near a one-month peak against the euro and pushed to a one-week high versus the yen on Tuesday as traders braced for crucial U.S. inflation data and fresh Federal Reserve interest rate forecasts the following day.】

item.title: 在中国，对身份的追求推动了 Lululemon 和高端运动装品牌的发展
item.description: 高级运动服装品牌在中国的增长势头强劲，因为它们直接向主要客户推销产品，这使耐克和阿迪达斯这两大品牌在这个价值 550 亿美元的运动服装市场上与本地竞争对手展开激烈竞争时再次受挫。【原文：Premium sportswear brands are enjoying robust growth in China as they take to directly courting their main customers, posing yet another setback to megabrands Nike and Adidas as they grapple with local competitors in the $55 billion sportswear market.】

item.title: 美国可能购买原油作为储备，油价延续涨势
item.description: 油价周二上涨，延续了前一天的涨势，原因是人们希望季节性燃料需求增加，以及美国可能购买原油用于石油储备，但美元走强限制了涨幅。【原文：Oil prices rose on Tuesday, extending the previous day's rally on hopes of higher seasonal fuel demand and potential U.S. crude purchases for its petroleum reserve, though gains were capped by a firmer dollar.】

item.title: 读卖新闻》报道：日本政府认为丰田公司的不当行为可能违反联合国标准
item.description: 读卖新闻》（Yomiuri）周二称，日本运输省已得出结论，丰田汽车在车辆认证方面的六起违规案例也可能违反了联合国标准。【原文：Japan's transport ministry has concluded that six cases of irregularities in vehicle certifications by Toyota Motor may also violate United Nations standards, the Yomiuri newspaper said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 越南关注绿色电力，但依靠煤炭避免停电
item.description: 一位官员告诉来访者，越南国营电力供应商 EVN 的总部已经熄灯，空调也已关闭，因为这家越南最大的电力公司正努力 "以身作则"，避免重蹈去年瘫痪性停电的覆辙。【原文：Lights are off and air conditioning is down at the headquarters of Vietnam's state-run electricity provider EVN as the country's top power utility tries to "lead by example" to avoid a repeat of last year's crippling blackouts, an official tells visitors.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，白宫接近任命戈德史密斯-罗梅罗（Goldsmith Romero）为美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）总裁
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，白宫即将任命衍生品监管机构的克里斯蒂-戈德史密斯-罗梅罗接替马丁-格鲁恩伯格出任联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp）总裁。【原文：The White House is close to naming derivatives regulator Christy Goldsmith Romero to replace Martin Gruenberg to head the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道行业官员：越南多年来首次允许企业进口黄金
item.description: 一位行业官员告诉路透社，越南十多年来首次允许企业进口黄金，目的是缩小当地价格与国际基准之间不断扩大的差距。【原文：Vietnam is expected to allow companies to import gold for the first time in over a decade, as it aims to bridge the widening gap between local prices and international benchmarks, an industry official told Reuters.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Bapcor 公司确认收到贝恩资本 12 亿美元收购要约
item.description: 澳大利亚 Bapcor 公司周二证实，该公司已收到私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）提出的非约束性指示性建议，贝恩资本将以 18.3 亿澳元（12.1 亿美元）的股权价值收购这家汽车零部件零售商。【原文：Australia's Bapcor on Tuesday confirmed it has received a non-binding indicative proposal from private equity firm Bain Capital to buy the automotive parts retailer in a deal that values its equity at A$1.83 billion ($1.21 billion).】

item.title: 澳大利亚力拓将收购三菱在博因冶炼厂近 12% 的股份
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业巨头力拓公司周二表示，将收购三菱商事株式会社持有的博因冶炼厂（Boyne Smelters）11.65% 的股份，具体金额尚未披露。【原文：Rio Tinto will acquire Mitsubishi Corp's 11.65% stake in Boyne Smelters for an undisclosed sum, the Australian mining giant said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 姆努钦的自由战略资本公司报告持有纽约商业银行 7.7% 的股份
item.description: Liberty Strategic Capital 周一披露，截至 6 月 7 日，该公司持有地区性贷款机构纽约社区银行 7.7% 的股份。【原文：Liberty Strategic Capital on Monday disclosed it held a 7.7% stake in regional lender New York Community Bancorp as of June 7.】

item.title: 早间竞标静观其变，日本蠢蠢欲动
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 特斯拉必须面对加州关于自动驾驶汽车的虚假营销指控
item.description: 加州一名行政法官驳回了特斯拉提出的驳回州最高监管机构指控亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克领导的这家汽车制造商夸大其车辆自动驾驶能力的请求。【原文：A California administrative judge rejected Tesla's bid to dismiss claims by a top state regulator accusing the automaker led by billionaire Elon Musk of overstating its vehicles' self-driving capabilities.】
